description: A small restaurant overlooking the lake in Lesina, where everything revolves around the professionalism and experience of the owner - chef, who selects the best produce from the lake region, including fish and aromatic herbs, and even produces his own mullet roe. Regional flavours are to the fore here, with the occasional modern twist.
